title: Doa Makan
translation: In the name of Allah, and with the blessings of Allah

title: Doa Tidur
translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live

title: Doa Perjalanan
content: Subhanalladhi sakhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrinin
translation: Glory be to the One who has subjected this to us, and we could not have done it by ourselves

title: Doa Masuk Rumah
content: Bismillah, walajna wa bismillah kharajna, wa 'ala rabbina tawakkalna
translation: In the name of Allah, we enter, and in the name of Allah, we leave, and upon our Lord we rely

title: Doa Keluar Rumah
content: Bismillah, tawakkaltu 'ala Allah, la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
translation: In the name of Allah, I put my trust in Allah, there is no power and no strength except with Allah

title: Doa Masuk Toilet
content: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-khubthi wal-khaba'ith
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the male and female devils

title: Doa Sakit
content: As'aluka Allah al-azim, rabb al-'arsh al-azim, an yashfiyani
translation: I ask Allah, the Mighty, Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure me

title: Doa Nabi Yunus
content: La ilaha illa anta, subhanaka inni kuntu min al-zalimin
translation: There is no god but You, glory be to You, I was indeed among the wrongdoers

title: Doa Harian
content: Bismillah, alhamdulillah, la ilaha illallah, Allahu Akbar
translation: In the name of Allah, praise be to Allah, there is no god but Allah, Allah is the Greatest

title: Doa Sebelum Belajar
translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge
